title: Dylan Groenewegen Changes Script to Beat Philipsen: ‘A Different Plan for the Tour De France This Year’
content:
With a stage in the AlUla Tour his next goal, Dutch sprinter is aiming to reach July in giant-killing form: 'Hopefully my fastest legs are in the Tour.'

Read the full article at Dylan Groenewegen Changes Script to Beat Philipsen: ‘A Different Plan for the Tour De France This Year’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
